snowmax: Number of snowflakes (more than 30 / 40 not recommended)
snowcolor: Colors for the snow. Add as many colors as you like
sinkspeed: Speed of sinking (recommended values range from 0.3 to 2)
snowingzone: Set 1 for all-over-snowing, 2 for left-side-snowing, 3 for center-snowing, 4 for right-side-snowing
